Tier 3; Weapon Training (Las), BS 40
Aptitudes: Ballistic Skill, Offence
system.effect: When firing any kind of Las Weapon on Semi or Full Auto, the character gains one additional Degree of Success on any successful test if they did not take a Move Action on their turn.
